description:
Task bar. Very light extension.

 Features:

 - Hide overview at start-up.

 - Scroll on taskbar to change workspace.

 - Show apps button (left click to enter overview, right click to show apps overview).

 - GNOME Shell dash items in top bar (left click to toggle or cycle, right click to show app menu, middle click to open new window).

 - Drag'n'drop favorites.

 - Remove 'Activities' button.

 - Change 'Places' extension label to an icon.

 No settings. If you want customization through preferences UI, please consider BaBar or Dash to Panel.

 ----------

 Please report any bug only through GitHub, I'm not notified here.
name: DashBar
